mapper.select: SELECT b.ckid, b.name, b.rank, b.skill, b.ckimage, b.ranklevel, b.startHealth, b.endHealth, b.rdate, b.grade, b."comment" FROM( SELECT ROWNUM no, t.ckid, t.name, t.rank, t.skill, t.ckimage, t.ranklevel, t.startHealth, t.endHealth, t.rdate, t.grade, t."comment" FROM( SELECT * FROM ck_cookies ORDER BY rdate DESC ) t )b WHERE b.no BETWEEN #{begin} and #{end}

SELECT b.ckid, b.name, b.rank, b.skill, b.ckimage, b.ranklevel, b.startHealth, b.endHealth, b.rdate, b.grade, b."comment" FROM( SELECT ROWNUM no, t.ckid, t.name, t.rank, t.skill, t.ckimage, t.ranklevel, t.startHealth, t.endHealth, t.rdate, t.grade, t."comment" FROM( SELECT * FROM ck_cookies WHERE REGEXP_LIKE(name, #{searchWord}, 'i') ORDER BY rdate DESC ) t )b WHERE b.no BETWEEN #{begin} and #{end}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ck_cookies WHERE REGEXP_LIKE(name, '${searchWord}', 'i')
